import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { changeCustomer } from "../../redux/actions/customer"; import { getCustomerById, sendPreapproval, } from "../../redux/actions/customers"; class CustomerLoadDetails extends Component { state = { currentWidth: 500, openLoanHistoryCommentBox: false, }; handleOpenLoanHistoryCommentBox = () => { this.setState({ openLoanHistoryCommentBox: !this.state.openLoanHistoryCommentBox }); }; render() { return ( <>
Total Balance $XXX
Maturity Date MM/DD/YY
Total Curr Due $XXX
Total Past Due $XXX
Days Past Due 12
Next Principal Billing and Due Date $XXX MM/DD/YY
Payment History
Due Date Amount Due Payment Effective Date Amount Paid Payment Method
$XXX $XXX $XXX $XXX $XXX
$XXX $XXX $XXX $XXX $XXX
COMMENT
); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ customer: state.customers.selected, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { getCustomerById, sendPreapproval, changeCustomer, })(CustomerLoadDetails);
